The birth of Cinema dates back on December 28 1895 in Paris by Lumi√®re Brothers. The first films were in black and white,no sound and run time less than a minute. The first film studios were built in 1897;in the 1900s the popularity of movies increased along with the success and new technologies. By 1910 actors and actresses started receiving credits for their roles.The first Oscars Ceremony was held on May 16 1929 at the Hollywood Roosevelt Hotel in Los Angeles.The ceremony was hosted by Douglas Fairbanks and it was the only one not to be broadcast on radio or television.By the end of 1929 Hollywood,a neighborhood in Los Angeles,became what we all know it is today,the symbol of entertainment business.
